00013 #include <stdlib.h>

00015 namespace stxxl
00016 {
00017         unsigned ran32State = time (NULL);
00018 
00019         struct random_number32
00020         {
00021     typedef unsigned value_type;
00022                 inline value_type operator () () const
00023                 {
00024                         return (ran32State = 1664525 * ran32State + 1013904223);
00025                 };
00026         };
00027         
00029         struct random_uniform_fast
00030         {
00031     typedef double value_type;
00032                 random_number32 rnd32;
00033                 inline value_type operator() () const
00034                 {
00035                         return ((double)rnd32() * (0.5 / 0x80000000));
00036                 }
00037         };
00038         
00042         struct random_uniform_slow
00043         {
00044     typedef double value_type;
00045                 inline value_type operator() () const
00046                 {
00047                         return drand48();
00048                 }
00049         };
00050         
00051         template <class UniformRGen_ = random_uniform_fast>
00052         struct random_number
00053         {
00054     typedef unsigned value_type;
00055                 UniformRGen_ uniform;
00056                 inline value_type operator () (int N) const
00057                 {
00058                         return ((value_type)(uniform() * (N)));
00059                 };
00060         };
00061         
00062         struct random_number64
00063         {
00064     typedef unsigned long long value_type;
00065                 random_uniform_slow uniform;
00066                 inline value_type operator() () const
00067                 {
00068                         return static_cast<value_type>(uniform()*(18446744073709551616.));
00069                 }
00070         };
00071         
00072 }
